name: interparty
content:

between political parties: Recent events have badly damaged interparty relations. We hoped that something new might come out of the interparty talks.
More examplesFewer examplesAs the representatives of the people, we should be above interparty bickering.The Unionists agreed to take part in inter-party talks aimed at political progress.Legislators blame interparty gridlock for inaction.Interparty coalitions are a feature of Alaskan politics.
